attributes.action: have a reduced  road tax for vehicles that run at night time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like to see a reduced road tax for vehicles that run only between the times of 6pm and 6am this would encourage more traffic onto the night roads when its a lot less busy and relieve some of the traffic on the day time roads.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence:  http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/LPGLowerRoadTax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
